submission:
class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, a: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        cnt = Counter()
        res = 0
        for x in a:
            cnt2 = Counter()
            for y, c in cnt.items():
                z = x & y
                if z == k: res += c
                cnt2[z] += c
            if x == k: res += 1
            cnt2[x] += 1
            cnt = cnt2
        return res
